title: Empire.io
author: Empire.io
created_time: September 15, 2023, 02:48:33 PMLast edit: September 15, 2023, 05:45:31 PM by Empire.io
content: Hello BitcoinTalk members. Happy Friday!Exciting news for you all! We're introducing another sweet promotion just for our BTCtalk familyWager 100 USDT on Sweet Bonanza and receive 50 free spins in Monday! What better way to start the week?How to ParticipateRegister/Login: If you haven't already, register or log in at www.Empire.ioNavigate to Video Slots: Head over to the video slots section.Wager 100 USDT or Equivalent: Play the game Sweet Bonanza, ensuring that your total wagering sums up to at least 100 USDT (or any currency equivalent) during the promotional period.Wait for Reward: 50 Free Spins on Sweet Bonanza from Pragmatic Play will be credited to your account by Monday before 18:00 GMT.Terms & ConditionsThe promotion is valid from Saturday 16/09 0:00 to Sunday 17/09 23:59 GMTOnly wagers on Sweet Bonanza count towards this promotion.Free spins will be credited by the following Monday before 18:00 GMT.Free Spins winnings must be wagered 20 times within two weeks.Standard Empire.io terms and conditions apply.Link to Empire.io announcement thread here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5464593.0Grab this offer while it lasts! Looking forward to seeing many of you on the reels.

comments.author: Empire.io
